viewData.name: Lashes Lifting Tool
viewData.short_description: Phi Lashes Lifting Tool is a high-quality stainless-steel instrument which is a fundamental part of the lash lifting process.┬á
viewData.long_description: Used for lifting and separating the lashes. Very sharp tip, convenient and comfortable to use soft grip, enables precise operation of the tool for a flawless lash lift process.
